Title: CHANDLER Swiss Mini Pocket Watch w RHODUIUM CASE
Description: CHANDLER Swiss Mini Pocket Watch w RHODUIUM CASE Chandler Swiss Made Women's Rhodium Locket Watch  This etched silver colored watch is Swiss Made by Chandler. It is made of rhodium. It has a pretty etched floral and vine design on both the front and back of the locket.   This watch is in excellent condition and measures approximately 2" tall including the stem and chain loop and 1 3/8" wide. This watch would make an excellent accessory piece or gift. You need to add a sterling silver chain as it does not come with one. Please see our other fine collectibles and gifts.
